text:
Bosch is a global leader
in technology and services.

In the mobility sector, we
focus on enabling sustainable
and seamless transportation.

The logistics sector
contributes to over 7%
of COâ‚‚ emissions globally.

This is fundamentally caused
due to the ineffective use
of the available mode of transportation.

To tackle this, Bosch teamed up with AWS
and created logistics platform
enabling optimization
of the transportation
and logistics segment.

This platform is bringing efficiency,
and with the aggregation of supply ecosystem,

enabling the logistics provider to cut their emissions
and to be operationally efficient.

- Together with AWS, we
created a decision-making
and load-planning tool,
leveraging the Bosch AI algorithm.
Thanks to the solution,
this specialist can automatically find

and accept new transport
orders, which helps them
to reduce their carbon footprint
and also increase the transparency
for transport order related emissions.

Bosch L.OS helps customers with
reducing empty trucks by 5%

and increasing efficiency
by 25%.
Within 15 months,
of strategic collaboration between Bosch and AWS,
we were able to deliver from our first POC

on to a production
deployment in a global scale,

which means the U.S., India
and the European region.
The swift rollout of L.OS was only possible

because of AWS's comprehensive
cloud offerings
and the massive support
of the AWS Professional Services team.

The AWS Well-Architected
framework helped Bosch L.OS

to scale and serve more
than 500 customers globally
- At Bosch, sustainability
is deep rooted in everything we do
- With AWS, we

also co-created digital
solutions such as RevX,

which is helping us to
increase the efficiency
by freight dispatching.

- By leveraging AWS's
decades of experience,
we are contributing
to the sustainability in global logistics

Which is enabling emission
free, accident free
and fascinating mobility for all.
